items.title: Main Courses
items.description: Served Meals. All entrées include homemade rolls & butter, one [gourmet salad](#salad), one [starch](#starch), one [vegetable](#vegetable), & [dessert](#sweets). Beverage service includes coffee, iced tea & iced water – served with biodegradable disposable ware unless otherwise requested. For split menu *(Add $3.00 per person)*. For buffet choose additional salad & entrée *(Add $4.00 per person)*.
